event: absence of metastases in 24 excised lymph nodes
loss of expression of MLH1 and PMS2
second dose of pembrolizumab not given
pain in neck and right leg
computed tomography did not show signs of stroke
increased creatine kinase and myoglobin levels
antibodies against acetylcholine receptor and titin present
autopsy showed significant stenosis of right coronary artery
no fibrosis or signs of recent myocardial infarction
inflammatory infiltration of lymphocytes in intercostal musculature, diaphragm, cervical musculature and tongue
fibrosis in one area of heart
inflammatory infiltrate in small area of heart
cause of death determined as respiratory insufficiency due to polymyositis
